mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.purchase_no AS "purchaseNo", a.ax_no AS "axNo", a.purchase_type AS "purchaseType", a.supplier_id AS "supplierId", a.payment_status AS "paymentStatus", a.arrival_status AS "arrivalStatus", a.new_remarks AS "newRemarks", a.workflow_status AS "workflowStatus"
mapper.select: SELECT , b.supplier_name AS "supplierName" FROM pm_purchase_ord a LEFT JOIN cm_supplier_info b ON b.supplier_id = a.supplier_id WHERE a.purchase_no = #{purchaseNo} AND a.workflow_status = '50' AND (a.arrival_status = '0' OR a.arrival_status = '1') AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pm_purchase_ord( id, proc_ins_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, purchase_no, ax_no, purchase_type, supplier_id, payment_status, arrival_status, new_remarks, workflow_status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{procInsId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{purchaseNo}, #{axNo}, #{purchaseType}, #{supplierId}, #{paymentStatus}, #{arrivalStatus}, #{newRemarks}, #{workflowStatus} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pm_purchase_ord SET proc_ins_id = #{procInsId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, purchase_no = #{purchaseNo}, ax_no = #{axNo}, purchase_type = #{purchaseType}, supplier_id = #{supplierId}, payment_status = #{paymentStatus}, arrival_status = #{arrivalStatus}, new_remarks = #{newRemarks}, workflow_status = #{workflowStatus} WHERE id = #{id}
